root.name: ESPN NHL 2K5
root.description: ESPN NHL 2K5 is still considered by man to be one of the best games in the series, and debuted on the market at a very favorable price point of $19.99 for consumers ($29.99 in Canada). It was also the last game in the NHL 2K Series to feature the ESPN License, after Electronic Arts purchased the exclusive rights in 2005.The game featured a number of improvements over ESPN NHL Hockey, including:Professional scouting in Franchise Mode Online Leagues using ESPNVideogames.com Improved GraphicsExcellent in game presentationImproved gameplaySliders for online playAdjustable camera settingsWinter Classic Arena (Edmonton, Alberta) ESPN NHL 2K5 was met with very favorable reviews for its realistic gameplay, extremely well done graphics/presentation, and plethora of modes and online features.
